content: {"name": "Brown Evangelistic Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "They serve the Cass Corridor neighborhood.\n\nBring an ID for each in the household.", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4311 3rd Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Midtown", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48201", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3498619, "longitude": -83.0686841}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 833-3330", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
